title: Need help with problems on phone.
content:
Hi 

NFC has stopped working. 
Wireless charging has stopped working. 

Back of the phone is coming off. I can see into the phone through the small gap. The glue keeps coming off here and there. I suspect its to do with the phone overheating though I'm not sure.   

Also the battery cuts out between 6-20 percent.


Please help.
